message.content:
cs.PL, cs.SE, cs.DC, cs.CR, cs.SY. 

The paper deals with system configuration languages and their use in managing computing infrastructure, which falls under the category of software engineering (cs.SE). The focus on Puppet, a widely used system configuration language, suggests that the paper may also fall under programming languages (cs.PL). The use of formal semantics and SMT solvers for verification suggests a connection to formal methods (cs.FL) and computer security (cs.CR). Finally, the application of the tool to real-world configurations suggests a connection to systems and control (cs.SY).
